hero.title: Let’s start afresh together
hero.content: Living a normal life once again is possible. Immuni helps us reach this goal faster and without compromising our privacy.

cta.span: Help yourself, your family, and your country.

feats.title: An extra tool to fight the epidemic
feats.content: Immuni is an app that helps us fight the COVID-19 epidemic. The app uses technology to alert people at risk of carrying the virus as early as possible—even when they are asymptomatic. It can do so more quickly and efficiently than any of the alternative methods.

benefits.title: Protection for ourselves and our loved ones
benefits.isolation: Users who may have the virus can isolate themselves to avoid infecting other people. By doing so, they help contain the epidemic and speed up the return to a normal life.
benefits.oldPeople: By being alerted early, the users can also contact their general practitioner more quickly and lower the risk of serious consequences.

tech.title: Innovation to serve the community
tech.content: With its innovative use of Bluetooth technology, the app sends a notification to those who were in close contact with a SARS-CoV-2-positive user, alerting them of the risk of infection. This takes place without the app gathering any data on the identity or the location of its users.

privacy.title: Your privacy is protected
privacy.content: Throughout Immuni’s entire design and development process, great care has been taken to safeguard your privacy. Any data, collected and managed by the Ministry of Health and by public entities, are stored on servers located in Italy. All the data and app connections with the server are encrypted.
privacy.subtitle: Immuni does not gather:

icons.data: Your first name, last name, or date of birth
icons.identity: The identity of the people you meet

faq.title: Want to know more?
faq.button: Take a look at the FAQ section

press.title: Press
press.content: Official graphic assets available for download
